welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Ismaning! Known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 24-hour time limit per device.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fuerstenfeldbruck Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Fuerstenfeldbruck Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
